name: Jumpstart v2
tagline: Version 2 of a quick start template for sites, apps and prototypes - based on the Yeoman Gulp Webapp Generator with added Jade templating.
body:
This scaffolding is based on Yeoman - install all the usual dependencies to get that running on your system, then do `npm install` and `bower install` to get the site's local dependencies and tooling installed. Once that is done you can `gulp serve` to spin up the development server with live-reload and `gulp` to build for distribution.

## TODO

I should really remove the references to Bootstrap from the bare-bones setup herein, it's a vestige of the scaffolding's first usage.

Also it's probably worth including a thinner set of feature-detection and JS bootstrapping that that offered out of the box by Modernizr.

Lower priority is the inclusion of a basic set of modules and design patterns for JS development and a bundle of utility functions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
